title: Architectures
description: Group your files to calculate dependencies and metrics, build graphs, and tag entities.

title: Interactive Reports
description: Combine graphs, tables, trees, and headings into exportable documents.

title: Metrics
description: Calculate custom metrics to export, sort, or color by.

title: CodeCheck
description: Validate your code against published standards and find vulnerabilities.

description: Access authors and dates and find technical debt from recurrently active files, coupling, and minor contributors.

description: Enforce code quality with Hersteller Initiative Software (HIS) metrics.

title: Solution: Shared Tasks
description: Find global objects accessed from multiple call trees.

title: Solution: Project Quality
description: Grade your project following research papers.
